channel.title: OpenSSL - Nodes affected!
channel.description:
Listen, on the 8th of April
530 Nodes are VULNERABLE 2995 Nodes are NOT VULNERABLE
Think i wait some time, when i start the Server again.
Best Regards!
grunge

item.title: OpenSSL - Nodes affected!
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
The openssl version running on my gateway is 1.0.1e-2+deb7u6. Is that safe?

Did I expose myself by posting today when there are still many nodes unpatched?

Read full topic
